tool_description: API showing climate events around the world
name: Climate change_v31
title: Climate change

api_list.name: Get news source feeds
api_list.description: Api showing news feedsa all over the planet
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://climate-change63.p.rapidapi.com/news/guadian"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "climate-change63.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

print(response.json())
